# Scenarios

## Purpose

- Select a limited number of species (groups) to procede with planning of surveillance/monitoring schemes
  - Planning relies on the INBO methodology ("Leidraad") 
- Focus on method-based synergies between species
  - Synergies for planning

::: {.notes}
- synergien tijdens de planning, niet noodzakelijk voor de implementatie

:::
  

## Scenarios

- Scenario 1: ANB priority species 
- Scenario 2: Focus on detection
- Scenario 3: Focus on distribution

::: {.notes}
- Scenario 1: Overlap between ANB priority species and our priority species 
- Scenario 2: Focus on species for which detection is (also) relevant
- Scenario 3: Focus on species for which distribution is (also) relevant
- 2 en 3 zijn redelijk complementair

:::
